Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Class representing the game itself. This class contains all to methods necessary to play a game

    • Game

      public Game(List<Player> players, String winner, boolean isFirstGame, LivingRoomBoard board, Turn currentTurn, Chat chat, GoalManager goalManager)
      Used for deserialization
      Parameters:
      players - players list
      winner - winner
      isFirstGame - game rule first game
      board - living room board
      currentTurn - current turn in the game
      chat - chat of the game
      goalManager - goal manager

  • Method Details

    • setGame

      public void setGame(@NotNull @NotNull List<String> players, boolean isFirstGame, String goalsFile) throws ArrestGameException
      Setting up of the game, notification are sent to the clients
      Parameters:
      players - list of players' names
      isFirstGame - easy rules game rule
      goalsFile - set up file of the goals, if null will be set to default internal file
      Throws:
      ArrestGameException - if there was an internal server error and the game couldn't be set

    • setGame

      public void setGame(@NotNull @NotNull Game game)
      Setting up of the game from another game. Must set first pushNotificationController. Notification are sent to the clients.
      Parameters:
      game - another game

      public boolean pickTiles(List<Tile> tiles)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the pick was successful, false otherwise
